descriptionHtml:
[img]http://up.picr.de/21063627vl.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a small farm house near the western watchtower of Whiterun.
I still got a few minor problems or a few things that need to get polished, but if you like to test this little farm, just go ahead :)


[u][b][size=5]How to use the displays for the daedric artifacts:
[/size][/b][/u]
Put your artifacts in the safe next to the bed. They then will decorate your house. 
...just because the two daedric rings might be a little bit hard to find: they are on the deadric gauntlet on top of the arcane enchanter.

[img]http://up.picr.de/21032416mm.jpg[/img]


[u][b][size=5]required mods:[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32550/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D32550&pUp=1]General Displays[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32550/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D32550&pUp=1]General Stores Patch[/url]
(please install in this order, click 'no' if NMM tells you there is a newer version when installing the patch. Only then the patch will be installed correctly)
Hearthfire DLC is required!


[u][b][size=5]known issues:
[/size][/b][/u]
1. once you married Groundskeeper Wilfried he will stop doing his daily working routine.

2. it also might happen, that he won't return to the Riverwood Farmhouse.
   
    ->How to fix this? I recomment:
     - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for follower by Volek
[/url]
3. for some reasons I coudn't set up displays for Masque of Clavicus Vile, Spellbreaker, Ebony Mail. I'm really sorry for that. 
    Maybe you like to use one of the Mannequins in the secret cellar to showcase these artifacts.

4. I couldn't set up a quest or whatever to actually make the keys obtainable, so for now this farm is obtainable for 0 Septims. 


[img]http://up.picr.de/21032633kf.jpg[/img]


[b][u][size=5]Special thanks to:[/size][/u]
[/b]

author: RanulNim
